select BOARD_NUM, BOARD_ID, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_TITLE from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(COMIC_BOARD pk_board) */ rownum rn, BOARD_NUM, BOARD_ID, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_TITLE from COMIC_BOARD where
rownum <=#{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}

select count(*) from COMIC_BOARD where
BOARD_NUM > 0
mapper.insert: insert into COMIC_BOARD (BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_ID, BOARD_DATE) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_NUM),0)+1 from COMIC_BOARD), #{BOARD_TITLE}, #{BOARD_CONTENT}, #{BOARD_ID}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: update COMIC_BOARD BOARD_TITLE = #{BOARD_TITLE}, BOARD_CONTENT=#{BOARD_CONTENT}, BOARD_ID = #{BOARD_ID}, BOARD_DATE = SYSDATE where BOARD_NUM = #{BOARD_NUM}
